page.title: 05MY ROAD
page.content: When I am standing on the step of my house I see about six bungalows and a number of houses. My house is made of brick and the roof has got slates on it which are a greeny colour and the bricks are brown. The paintwork of the outside of my house is a mustard colour. I have got three windows at the front of my house and they are double glazed. In the front of the house we have got some grass and soil at the end with flowers, then right at the front there is a four foot brick wall which is a grey colour. My road is a dead end; it goes round at the top and is straight at the sides. It is a tarmac road. Altogether there are about forty four houses ad bungalows.
